original_text: And Nathan said to the king, “Go, do all that is in your heart, for the Lord is with you.”
korean_text: 나단이 왕께 아뢰되 여호와께서 왕과 함께 계시니 마음에 있는 모든 것을 행하소서 하니라

sentences.original_text: And Nathan said to the king
do all that is in your heart
sentences.korean_translation: 네 마음에 있는 모든 것을 행하라

sentences.original_text: for the Lord is with you
